title: Draft an Affidavit
description: In support of a motion, an attorney needs to draft an affidavit for a witness to sign, attesting to certain facts.

tasks.description: Interview the witness to gather the facts they can attest to under oath.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a clear understanding of the witness's testimony.

tasks.description: Draft the affidavit, presenting the facts in a series of numbered paragraphs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clearly written factual statement.

tasks.description: Include a notary block for the witness to sign the affidavit under penalty of perjury.
tasks.expected_outcome: The draft affidavit is legally formatted and ready for execution.
